channel.title: How do I uninstall the side loaded Radix Ledger app from my Nano S?
channel.description:
The following documents on docs.radixdlt.com have instructions for uninstalling the side loaded Radix Ledger App from your Ledger Nano S device:
MacOS: [Uninstalling the Radix Ledger App - MacOS](https://docs.radixdlt.com/main/user-applications/ledger-app-sideload-macos.html#_uninstalling_the_radix_ledger_app) Windows: [Uninstalling the Radix Ledger App - Windows](https://docs.radixdlt.com/main/user-applications/ledger-app-sideload-windows.html#_uninstalling_the_radix_ledger_app)

item.title: How do I uninstall the side loaded Radix Ledger app from my Nano S?
item.dc:creator: Stuart | RadixPool

The following documents on docs.radixdlt.com have instructions for uninstalling the side loaded Radix Ledger App from your Ledger Nano S device:
